org.hps.evio

Class StuckFADCBit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.evio.StuckFADCBit

  • public class StuckFADCBit
extends Object
    Tools to resolve stuck FADC bit in 2019 run, based on comparing measured and expected pedestal values.
